text: Thank you <@UFW6VGEP4> for the typo correction and link correction, the community appreciates it!
thank you <@U7SL518D6>. Did I make those requests correctly? I am new to Github collaboration

Yep, you did it perfectly, if anything I was in the wrong. You’re correct about not currently having a develop branch for the chrome extension.

That’s something I need to correct. I should also update the documentation to make an exception for documentation/markdown file edits. Most of the time those kinds of edits are perfectly fine to have in the master branch directly as they’re not going to hurt anything.
thank you Jon for these explanations, very helpful
